privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.intro: Girona Neta is a civic application that allows citizens to report waste and litter incidents on public roads in Girona.
privacy.dataText: When you submit a report, we only collect: the location of the incident (coordinates), the photos you attach, the optional description you provide and the type of incident selected. We do not collect any personally identifiable data (name, phone, email).
privacy.purposeText: The data is used exclusively to manage the resolution of the reported incident. An administrator reviews the report and, if appropriate, forwards it to the municipal cleaning service.
privacy.retentionText: Data is retained only for the time necessary to manage the incident.
privacy.rightsText: You can exercise your rights of access, rectification, erasure and objection by contacting: info@gironaneta.cat.
